announcement:
Codeless Backtesting/Minute Data


We have added UI driven backtesting to expedite backesting process. Now, you can choose trading conditions, resolution and other settings with just a few clicks.

  1. Multiple Technical Indicators
  2. Minute Resolution Data
  3. Free 20 Backtests Everyday


We hope you enjoy the new backtester. If you need any help, face any issues case or have any feature request, write us at shiv.chawla@aimsquant.com

Improved UI and faster backtests


We have improved the UI for better and faster navigation through the platform.

  1. Improved Code Editor
  2. Compare Backtests Feature
  3. Faster execution speed


The web-app is still beta and we rely on your inputs to improve it further. Please send your feedback using the Send us Feedback link
